body:
Comment 1: 
If you look in $GOROOT/src/pkg/math/bits.go, you will find the float64 values for
+Inf, -Inf, and NaN, as well as tests for IsInf and IsNan.  Many of the math.Func()
routines handle special values, and I am in the process of adding them to others that
might need them for IEEE 754 compliance.  However, go does not have signed zero
(yet). I hope that helps.
